characterDescription:
Bila is a Parshendi warrior in Narak during the War of Reckoning. She is partnered with Thude - a warpair of Eshonai's own personal division.
She no longer cares about listener origins. She believes there will be others like her, people who ignore the danger of the gods and focus only on the fight with the humans.
Bila is extremely concerned with whether bonding with stormspren will allow her to kill humans.
